name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TikTok Ads Video Downloader & Data Export

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View all TikTok video ads data, download videos in high res, and export all ad data. We make it easy to create your next TikTok ad!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
❤️ Save TikTok ads video & export to Ad library from TikTok Creative Ad Library. TokView makes it easy to save your next video❤️.

Let Tok View Save & Export Data be your most powerful AI assistant for TikTok Ads Library video.

Here is the solution that helps to save ad videos from TT Creative Center, export ads data and build a collection of inspiring videos for your next ad campaign. 

It can help Agencies, Creators, and influencers to achieve effective download video, analysis video without stress and frustration.


✅ Features:
- Easy to use: TokView - Save ads from Ad Library with 1 click.
- No login required: Simply go to the Creative Center and download video, cover image, and all the stats.
-  Friendly interface: Quickly show TT ads video data over the cover image instantly.
-  Supporting CSV data export: Free your hands from writing down data manually, and export all ad video data. Including: Title of Ad, Comments, Shares, Likes, and Video URL.


✅ You can:
1. Download TikTok ads video from Creative Center in one click
2. Quickly get ads video info(video duration, like, share, comment) over the cover
3. Export TT Video Ads data you selected from any ad.


✅How to use:
- Pin TokView - TT Ads Library Downloader - Save & Export Data to the toolbar
- Click on the extension icon in chrome toolbar and go to Creative Center  
- Hover over the video cover and instantly see all video stats.
- Select the ads video data you want to export instantly.
- Click on the extension icon to download CSV exported data on selected ads data



Quickly view any data by simply hovering over the thumbnail, download high resolution videos of ANY ad, and bulk download and export any TT video data with 1 click. It's that easy.

Planning and researching your next Ad Campaign and UGC Influencer outreach / content isn't easy. That's why the best Content Creators, Social Media Managers, Agencies, Influencers, and Media Publishers. use TOKview to help their TT Ad Campaigns and Influencer UGC content creation.

Why spend hours sorting through, writing down data manually, and screen recording your favorite video ads when you can just use TOKview? Our 1 click button helps you make sense of all the confusing data TT gives you and helps give you answers that work!

Tok View for Chrome is a powerful tool that lets every TikTok creator better understand their TT video ad campaigns, without all the stress and frustration.

Creating a TT Strategy has never been easier.
